mapper.select: SELECT a.AdID, a.Content, a.Link, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ads.EndTime) EndTime, a.Title, a.Type, s.SpaceType, s.SpaceCode, s.SpaceName, s.PathDes, s.SpaceWidth, s.SpaceHeight, c.ChannelCode, c.ChannelName, p.PlatformCode, p.PlatformName FROM AdSpaceRela ads LEFT JOIN SpaceInfo s ON ads.SpaceID = s.SpaceID LEFT JOIN AdInfo a ON a.AdID = ads.AdID LEFT JOIN ChannelInfo c ON s.ChannelID = c.ChannelID LEFT JOIN PlatformInfo p ON p.PlatformID = s.PlatformID WHERE ads.`Status` = '正在投放' AND ads.IsDelete = 0

select Day from AdSpaceView where IsDelete=0 and SpaceID=#{spaceID}
and DATE_FORMAT(Day,'%Y-%m')=#{cycle}

select c.ChannelID,c.ChannelCode,c.ChannelName,p.PlatformName,p.PlatformID,p.PlatformCode,s.SpaceID,c.Description,c.IsOpen,c.ModifyTime,c.UpdateUserID FROM ChannelInfo c LEFT JOIN (SELECT s1.SpaceID,s1.ChannelID,s1.PlatformID from SpaceInfo s1 where s1.IsDelete=0) s ON s.ChannelID=c.ChannelID left join (select cp1.IsDelete,cp1.ChannelID,cp1.PlatformID from ChannelPlatformRela cp1 where cp1.IsDelete=0) cp ON c.ChannelID=cp.ChannelID LEFT JOIN (select p1.PlatformName,p1.IsDelete,p1.PlatformID ,p1.PlatformCode FROM PlatformInfo p1 where p1.IsDelete=0
and p1.IsOpen = '${platformStatus}'
) p ON p.PlatformID=cp.PlatformID where c.IsDelete=0
and c.ChannelID = '${channelId}'
and c.ChannelCode = '${channelCode}'
and c.ChannelName = '${channelName}'
and c.IsOpen = '${isOpen}'
ORDER BY c.ChannelCode

select p.PlatformID,p.PlatformCode,p.PlatformName,c.ChannelName,c.ChannelID,s.SpaceID,p.Description,p.IsOpen,p.ModifyTime,p.UpdateUserID FROM PlatformInfo p LEFT JOIN (SELECT s1.SpaceID,s1.PlatformID,s1.ChannelID from SpaceInfo s1 where s1.IsDelete=0) s ON s.PlatformID=p.PlatformID left join (select cp1.IsDelete,cp1.ChannelID,cp1.PlatformID from ChannelPlatformRela cp1 where cp1.IsDelete=0) cp ON p.PlatformID=cp.PlatformID LEFT JOIN (select c1.ChannelName,c1.IsDelete,c1.ChannelID FROM ChannelInfo c1 where c1.IsDelete=0) c ON c.ChannelID=cp.ChannelID where p.IsDelete=0
and p.PlatformID = '${platformID}'
and p.IsOpen = '${isOpen}'
